thread.title: BRIEF-Environment And Climate Change Canada Laid Ten Charges Against Husky Energy Relating To Heavy Crude-Oil Spill In July 2016

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Environment And Climate Change Canada Laid Ten Charges Against Husky Energy Relating To Heavy Crude-Oil Spill In July 2016

organizations.name: climate change canada laid ten charges against husky energy

text:
March 26 (Reuters) -
* ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE CHANGE CANADA ON MARCH 22 LAID NUMBER OF CHARGES AGAINST HUSKY ENERGY RELATING TO HEAVY CRUDE-OIL SPILL, IN JULY 2016
* ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE CHANGE CANADA HAS LAID TEN CHARGES AGAINST HUSKY IN RELATION TO HEAVY CRUDE-OIL SPILL,
* ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE CHANGE CANADA HAS LAID TEN CHARGES AGAINST HUSKY ENERGY IN RELATION TO HEAVY CRUDE-OIL SPILL WHICH IMPACTED NORTH SASKATCHEWAN RIVER‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
